long_description: The REI Overnighter Pack combines a comfortable backpack carry system with storage, organization and security features to meet the needs of the overnight and ultralight traveler. REI Overnighter pack is sized to fit into most airline overhead bins. Backpack style shoulder straps easily tuck away into back panel when not in use; molded foam back panel is comfortable, protective and durable for the long haul. Panel opening zipper for easy access to contents; 2 interior, adjustable straps provide compression and control of packed items. Internal mesh pocket provides easy separation of items in the main compartment. Includes a fully featured organizer panel with multiple pockets for pens, electronics and small essentials. Exterior fleece-lined zippered pocket protects small valuables. Exterior pocket accommodates travel documents, tickets and boarding passes. Adjustable-length shoulder strap with sliding pad ensures comfort and secure single-shoulder/messenger-style carrying; D-rings provide attachment points.
short_description: The REI Overnighter Pack combines a comfortable backpack carry system with storage, organization and security features to meet the needs of the overnight and ultralight traveler.
